title: The Department Of Energy's Resource Adequacy Report Affirms The Energy Emergency Facing The U.S. Power Grid

outline.text: The Department Of Energy's Resource Adequacy Report Affirms The Energy Emergency Facing The U.S. Power Grid

THE NEW REPORT REVEALS, PLANT CLOSURES AND OVERRELIANCE ON INTERMITTENT ENERGY SOURCES DRIVEN BY A RADICAL GREEN AGENDA, AND INCREASING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DEMAND, COULD LEAD TO A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN U.S. POWER OUTAGES
AI INNOVATION IS ACCELERATING ENERGY DEMANDS AND THE NEED FOR RELIABLE, FIRM GENERATION SOURCES
PRESIDENT TRUMP AND THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY ARE WORKING TO SECURE GRID RELIABILITY
